text:
:4587_christmasparrot: *Hello HubSpot Developer Community!* :snowman:
Here's a silly little something from us to you - we wish you all a very Happy Holiday season, and look forward to a successful 2025! _As a heads up, I'll be OOO from tomorrow-through January 6th, as will much of HubSpot._

Hello, I'm looking to make an integration with an external provider in such a way that they, from their whatsapp AI service, can send us conversations into our HubSpot inbox. The thing is that I'm currently in need of the API key (which I have from a private application) and I also need the route from the API to add this new conversations. Does anyone know where can I get the route for making the integration?
